subject: Football
lead_paragraph: If the Giants reach the playoffs, they would almost certainly play the rest of their games away from home. This would be a blessing of sorts. They are 4-3 on the road and 3-4 at home.
snippet: If the Giants reach the playoffs, they would almost certainly play the rest of their games away from home. This would be a blessing of sorts. They are 4-3 on the road and 3-4 at home.
